GS39kamasufu:319: 2.1.3 viparyayeṇa vi:ṣamāṇi ṣaṭ. vi:ṣameṣv api puruṣādhikyaṃ ced
GS39kamasufu:320: an:antara-saṃprayoge dve ucca-rate. vyavahitam ekam ucca-tara-ratam.
GS39kamasufu:321: viparyaye punar dve nīca-rate. vyavahitam ekaṃ nīca-tara-rataṃ ca. teṣu samāni śreṣṭhāni. tara-śabdāṅkite dve kaniṣṭhe. śeṣāṇi madhyamāni.
GS39kamasufu:322: 2.1.4 sāmye 'py uccāṅkaṃ nīcāṅkāj jyāyaḥ. iti pramāṇato nava-ratāni.

GS39kamasufu:328: 2.1.10 na strī puruṣavad eva bhāvam adhigacchati.
GS39kamasufu:329: 2.1.11 sātatyāt tv asyāḥ puruṣeṇa kaṇḍūtir apanudyate.
GS39kamasufu:330: 2.1.12 sā punar ābhimānikena sukhena saṃsṛṣṭā rasāntaraṃ janayati tasmin sukha-buddhir

GS39kamasufu:332: 2.1.14 katham etad upalabhyata iti cet puruṣo hi ratim adhigamya svecchayā viramati na striyam apekṣate na tv evaṃ strīty auddālikaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:333: 2.1.15 tatraitat syāt cira-vege nāyake striyo 'nurajyante śīghra-vegasya
GS39kamasufu:334: bhāvam an:āsādyāvasāne 'bhyasūyinyo bhavanti. tat sarvaṃ bhāva-prāpter
GS39kamasufu:336: 2.1.16 tac ca na. kaṇḍūti-pratīkāro 'pi hi dīrgha-kālaṃ priya iti. etad upapadyata eva. tasmāt saṃdigdhatvād a:lakṣaṇam iti.
GS39kamasufu:337: 2.1.17v saṃyoge yoṣitaḥ puṃsā kaṇḍūtir apanudyate. tac cābhimāna-saṃsṛṣṭaṃ
GS39kamasufu:339: 2.1.18 sātatyād yuvatir ārambhāt prabhṛti bhāvam adhigacchati. puruṣaḥ punar anta eva. etad upapannataram. na hy a:satyāṃ bhāva-prāptau

GS39kamasufu:346: bhramarakasya vā bhrāntāv eva vartamānasya prārambhe manda-vegatā tataś ca krameṇa pūraṇaṃ vegasyety upapadyate. dhātu-kṣayāc ca virāmābhīpseti.
GS39kamasufu:348: 2.1.22v suratānte sukhaṃ puṃsāṃ strīṇāṃ tu satataṃ sukham.

GS39kamasufu:355: yuvatiḥ. anyathā hi kartā kriyāṃ pratipadyate 'nyathā cādhāraḥ. tasmāc
GS39kamasufu:356: copāya-vailakṣaṇyāt sargād abhimāna-vailakṣaṇyam api bhavati. abhiyoktāham iti puruṣo 'nurajyate. abhiyuktāham aneneti yuvatir iti vātsyāyanaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:357: 2.1.27 tatraitat syād upāya-vailakṣaṇyavad eva hi kārya-vailakṣaṇyam api kasmān na syād iti. tac ca na. hetumad upāya-vailakṣaṇyam. tatra
GS39kamasufu:360: 2.1.28 tatraitat syāt. saṃhatya kārakair eko 'rtho 'bhinirvartyate. pṛthak pṛthak svārtha-sādhakau punar imau tad a:yuktam iti.
GS39kamasufu:361_0: 2.1.29 tac ca na. yugapad an:ekārtha-siddhir api dṛśyate. yathā meṣayor abhighāte
GS39kamasufu:361_1: kapitthayor bhede mallayor yuddha iti. na tatra kāraka-bheda iti ced ihāpi na vastu-bheda
GS39kamasufu:361_2: iti. upāya-vailakṣaṇyaṃ tu sargād iti tad abhihitaṃ purastāt. tenobhayor api sadṛśī

GS39kamasufu:1153: 3.4.14 tatra siddhaḥ padāt padam adhikam ākāṅkṣet.

GS39kamasufu:1192: 3.4.43 pariṣvaktā((90)) ca na vikṛtiṃ bhajet. ślakṣṇam((91)) ākāram

GS39kamasufu:1420: 4.2.48 dharma-kṛtyeṣu ca puraś-cāriṇī syād vratopavāsayoś ca.

GS39kamasufu:2047: 6.2.75v sūkṣmatvād ati:lobhāc ca prakṛtyājñānatas tathā. kāma-lakṣma tu

GS39kamasufu:2057: 6.3.3 viditam apy upāyaiḥ pariṣkṛtaṃ dvi-guṇaṃ dāsyatīti vātsyāyanaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:2066: 6.3.10 tad-artham ṛṇa-grahaṇam. jananyā saha tad-udbhavasya vyayasya
GS39kamasufu:2068: 6.3.12 taiś ca pūrvam āhṛtā guravo 'bhihārāḥ pūrvam upanītāḥ pūrvaṃ
GS39kamasufu:2074: 6.3.17 gṛha-karma sakhyāḥ putrasyotsañjanam dohado vyādhir mitrasya duḥkhāpanayanam iti.
GS39kamasufu:2076: 6.3.19 tayā śīlitasya cālaṅkārasya bhāṇḍopaskarasya vā vaṇijo vikrayārthaṃ
GS39kamasufu:2078: 6.3.20 prati:gaṇikānāṃ ca sadṛśasya bhāṇḍasya vyatikare prativiśiṣṭasya grahaṇam.

GS39kamasufu:2082: 6.3.24 pūrva-yogināṃ ca lābhātiśayena punaḥ sandhāne yatamānānām āviṣ:kṛtaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:2087: 6.3.27 vi:raktaṃ ca nityam eva prakṛti-vikriyāto vidyān mukha-varṇāc ca.
GS39kamasufu:2096: 6.3.36 tasya sāra-dravyāṇi prāg avabodhād anyāpadeśena haste kurvīta.
GS39kamasufu:2097: 6.3.37 tāni cāsyā hastād uttama-rṇaḥ prasahya gṛhṇīyāt.
GS39kamasufu:2101: 6.3.39 saktaṃ tu pūrvopakāriṇam apy alpa-phalaṃ vyālīkenānupālayet.
GS39kamasufu:2102: 6.3.40 a:sāraṃ tu niṣpratipattikam upāyato 'pavāhayet. anyam avaṣṭabhya.
GS39kamasufu:2103: 6.3.41 tad-an:iṣṭa-sevā. ninditābhyāsaḥ. oṣṭha-nirbhogaḥ. pādena bhūmer abhighātaḥ. a:vijñāta-viṣayasya saṃkathā. tad-vijñāteṣv a:vismayaḥ kutsā
GS39kamasufu:2104: ca. darpa-vighātaḥ adhikaiḥ saha saṃvāsaḥ. an:apekṣaṇam. samāna-doṣāṇāṃ
GS39kamasufu:2106: 6.3.42 jugupsā. pariṣvaṅge bhujamayyā sūcyā vyavadhānam. stabdhatā
GS39kamasufu:2107: gātrāṇām. sakthnor vyatyāsaḥ. nidrā-paratvaṃ ca. śrāntam upalabhya codanā.
GS39kamasufu:2108: a:śaktau hāsaḥ. śaktāv an:abhinandanam. divāpi. bhāvam upalabhya mahājanābhigamanam.
GS39kamasufu:2109: 6.3.43 vākyeṣu cchala-grahaṇam. a:narmaṇi hāsaḥ. narmaṇi cānyam apadiśya
GS39kamasufu:2110: hasati vadati tasmin kaṭākṣeṇa parijanasya prekṣaṇaṃ tāḍanaṃ ca. āhatya cāsya kathām anyāḥ kathāḥ. tad-vyālīkānāṃ vyasanānāṃ cā:parihāryāṇām
GS39kamasufu:2112: 6.3.44 āgate cā:darśanam. a:yācya-yācanam. ante svayaṃ mokṣaś ceti parigrahakasyeti dattakasya.

GS39kamasufu:2115: 6.3.46v evam etena kalpena sthitā veśyā parigrahe. nātisandhīyate gamyaiḥ karoty arthāṃś ca puṣkalān((171))..

GS39kamasufu:2123: 6.4.2 sa ced avasitārtho vittavān sānurāgaś ca tataḥ sandheyaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:2124: 6.4.3 anyatra gatas tarkayitavyaḥ. sa kārya-yuktyā ṣaḍ-vidhaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:2125: 6.4.4 itaḥ svayam apasṛtas tato 'pi svayam evāpasṛtaḥ [1]..6.4.5 itas tataś ca niṣkāsitāpasṛtaḥ
GS39kamasufu:2130: 6.4.10 itas tataś ca svayam evāpasṛtyopajapati ced ubhayor guṇān apekṣī
GS39kamasufu:2132: 6.4.11 itas tataś ca niṣkāsitāpasṛtaḥ sthira-buddhiḥ. sa ced anyato bahu labhamānayā niṣkāsitaḥ syāt sa:sāro 'pi tayā roṣito mamā:marṣād bahu dāsyatīti saṃdheyaḥ [2a].
GS39kamasufu:2133: 6.4.12 niḥsāratayā kadaryatayā vā tyakto na śreyān [2b].
GS39kamasufu:2134: 6.4.13 itaḥ svayam apasṛtas tato niṣkāsitāpasṛto yady atiriktam ādau ca
GS39kamasufu:2136: 6.4.14 itaḥ svayam apasṛtya tatra sthita upajapaṃs tarkayitavyaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:2137_0: 6.4.15 viśeṣārthī cāgatas tato viśeṣam a:pasyann āgantu-kāmo mayi māṃ jijñāsitu-kāmaḥ
GS39kamasufu:2137_1: sā āgatya sānurāgatvād dāsyati. tasyāṃ vā doṣān dṛṣṭvā mayi bhūyiṣṭhān guṇān adhunā
GS39kamasufu:2138: 6.4.16 bālo vā naikatra-dṛṣṭir atisaṃdhāna-pradhāno vā haridrā-rāgo vā
GS39kamasufu:2139: yat-kiṃ-cana-kārī vety avetya saṃdadhyān na vā [4b].
GS39kamasufu:2140: 6.4.17 ito niṣkāsitāpasṛtas tataḥ svayam upasṛta upajapaṃs tarkayitavyaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:2141: 6.4.18 anurāgād āgantu-kāmaḥ sa bahu dāsyati. mama guṇair bhāvito yo
GS39kamasufu:2143: 6.4.19 pūrvam a:yogena vā mayā niṣkāsitaḥ sa māṃ śīlayitvā vairaṃ
GS39kamasufu:2144: niryātayitu-kāmo dhanam abhiyogād vā mayāsyāpahṛtaṃ tad-viśvāsya pratīpam
GS39kamasufu:2145: ādātu-kāmo nirveṣṭu-kāmo vā māṃ vartamānād bhedayitvā tyaktu-kāma ity
GS39kamasufu:2148: 6.4.21 ito niṣkāsitas tatra sthita upajapann etena vyākhyātaḥ [6].
GS39kamasufu:2150: 6.4.23 vyālīkārthaṃ niṣkāsito mayāsāv anyatra gato yatnād ānetavyaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:2151: 6.4.24 itaḥ pravṛtta-saṃbhāṣo vā tato bhedam avāpsyati.
GS39kamasufu:2153: 6.4.26 arthāgama-kāle vāsya. sthāna-vṛddhir asya jātā. labdham
GS39kamasufu:2154: anenādhikaraṇam. dārair viyuktaḥ pāratantryād vyāvṛttaḥ. pitrā bhrātrā vā
GS39kamasufu:2156: 6.4.27 anena vā pratibaddham anena sandhiṃ kṛtvā nāyakaṃ dhaninam avāpsyāmi.
GS39kamasufu:2157: 6.4.28 vimānitā vā bhāryayā tam eva tasyāṃ vikramayiṣyāmi.
GS39kamasufu:2158: 6.4.29 asya vā mitraṃ mad-dveṣiṇīṃsa:patnīṃ kāmayate tad amunā
GS39kamasufu:2161: 6.4.31 tasya pīṭhamardādayo mātur dauḥśīlyena nāyikāyāḥ saty apy anurāge vivaśāyāḥ pūrvaṃ niṣkāsanaṃ varṇayeyuḥ.
GS39kamasufu:2163: 6.4.33 tasyāś ca sābhijñānaiḥ pūrvānurāgair enaṃ pratyāpayeyuḥ.
GS39kamasufu:2166: 6.4.35 a:pūrva-pūrva-saṃsṛṣṭayoḥ pūrva-saṃsṛṣṭaḥ śreyān. sa hi vidita-śīlo
GS39kamasufu:2169: duḥkhaṃ ca punar viśvāsayitum. a:pūrvas tu sukhenānurajyata iti
GS39kamasufu:2173: 6.4.38v anyāṃ bhedayituṃ gamyād anyato gamyam eva vā. sthitasya copaghātārthaṃ punaḥ saṃdhānam
GS39kamasufu:2174: 6.4.39v bibhety anyasya saṃyogād vyālīkāni ca nekṣate. ati:saktaḥ pumān yatra bayād bahu dadāti
GS39kamasufu:2175: 6.4.40v a:saktam abhinandeta saktaṃ paribhavet tathā. anya-dūtānupāte ca yaḥ syād ati:viśāradaḥ..
GS39kamasufu:2176: 6.4.41v tatropayāyinaṃ pūrvaṃ nārī kālena yojayet. bhavec
GS39kamasufu:2178: 6.4.42v saktaṃ tu vaśinaṃ nārī saṃbhāvyāpy anyato vrajet. tataś cārtham upādāya saktam
GS39kamasufu:2179: 6.4.43v āyatiṃ prasamīkṣyādau lābhaṃ prītiṃ ca puṣkalām. sauhṛdaṃ pratisaṃdadhyād viśīrṇaṃ strī vicakṣaṇā((173))..
GS39kamasufu:2180: 6.4c iti śrī vātsyāyanīye kāmasūtre vaiśike ṣaṣṭhe 'dhikaraṇe
GS39kamasufu:2183: 6.5.1 gamya-bāhulye bahu prati:dinaṃ ca labhamānā naikaṃ pratigṛhṇīyāt.
GS39kamasufu:2184: 6.5.2 deśaṃ kālaṃ sthitim ātmano guṇān saubhāgyaṃ cānyābhyo nyūnātiriktāṃ cāvekṣya rajanyām((174)) arthaṃ sthāpayet.
GS39kamasufu:2185: 6.5.3 gamye dūtāṃś ca prayojayet. tat-pratibaddhāṃś ca svayaṃ prahiṇuyāt.
GS39kamasufu:2186: 6.5.4 dvis triś catur iti lābhātiśaya-grahārtham ekasyāpi gacchet.
GS39kamasufu:2188: 6.5.5 gamya-yaugapadye tu lābha-sāmye yad dravyārthinī syāt tad dāyini viśeṣaḥ praty:akṣa ity ācāryāḥ.
GS39kamasufu:2193: 6.5.8 yat tatra sāmyād vā dravya-sāmye mitra-vākyād ati:pātitvād āyatito
GS39kamasufu:2195: 6.5.9 rāgi-tyāginos tyāgini viśeṣaḥ pratyakṣa ity ācāryāḥ.
GS39kamasufu:2197: 6.5.11 lubdho 'pi hi raktas tyajati na tu tyāgī nirbandhād rājyata iti
GS39kamasufu:2200: tyāgi-prayojana-kartroḥ prayojana-kartari viśeṣaḥ pratyakṣa ity ācāryāḥ.
GS39kamasufu:2201: 6.5.13 prayojana-kartā sakṛt kṛtvā kṛtinam ātmānaṃ manyate tyāgī punar atītaṃ nāpekṣata iti
GS39kamasufu:2203: 6.5.15 kṛtajña-tyāginos tyāgini viśeṣaḥ pratyakṣa ity ācāryāḥ.
GS39kamasufu:2204: 6.5.16 ciram ārādhito 'pi tyāgī vyalīkam ekam upalabhya pratigaṇikayā vā
GS39kamasufu:2206: 6.5.17 prāyeṇa hi tejasvina ṛjavo 'n:ādṛtāś ca tyāgino bhavanti.
GS39kamasufu:2207: 6.5.18 kṛtajñas tu pūrva-śramāpekṣī na sahasā virajyate.
GS39kamasufu:2208: parīkṣita-śīlatvāc ca na mithyā dūṣyata iti vātsyāyanaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:2210: 6.5.20 mitra-vacanārthāgamayor arthāgame viśeṣaḥ pratyakṣa ity ācāryāḥ.
GS39kamasufu:2211: 6.5.21 so pi hy arthāgāmo bhavitā. mitraṃ tu sakṛd-vākye pratihate kaluṣitaṃ syād iti vātsyāyanaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:2213: 6.5.23 tatra kārya-saṃdarśanena mitram anunīya śvo-bhūte vacanam astv iti
GS39kamasufu:2217: 6.5.25 arthaḥ parimitāvacchedaḥ an:arthaḥ punaḥ sakṛt-prasṛto na jñāyate kvāvatiṣṭhata iti vātsyāyanaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:2221: nibandhanam go-sahasrāṇāṃ pātrāntaritaṃ brāhmaṇebhyo dānam devatānāṃ
GS39kamasufu:2222: pūjopahāra-pravartanam tad-vyaya-sahiṣṇor vā dhanasya parigrahaṇam ity
GS39kamasufu:2224: 6.5.29 sārvāṅgiko 'kaṅkāra-yogo gṛhasyodārasya karaṇam. mahārhair bhāṇḍaiḥ paricārakaiś ca gṛha-paricchādasyojjvalateti rūpa-jīvānāṃ lābhātiśayaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:2225: 6.5.30 nityaṃ śuklam ācchādanam apakṣudam anna-pānaṃ nityaṃ saugandhikena tāmbūlena ca yogaḥ sa:hiraṇya-bhāgam alaṅkaraṇam iti kumbha-dāsīnāṃ
GS39kamasufu:2227: 6.5.31 etena pradeśena madhyamādhamānām api lābhātiśayān sarvāsām eva yojayed ity ācāryāḥ.
GS39kamasufu:2230: 6.5.33 gamyam anyato nivārayitu-kāmā saktam anyasyām apahartu-kāmā vā anyāṃ vā lābhato viyuyukṣamāṇā:gamya-saṃsargād ātmanaḥ sthānaṃ vṛddhim
GS39kamasufu:2231: āyatim abhigamyatāṃ ca manyamānā an:artha-pratīkāre vā sāhāyyam enaṃ
GS39kamasufu:2232: kārayitu-kāmā saktasya vānyasya vyalīkārthinī pūrvopakāram a:kṛtam iva paśyantī kevala-prīty-arthinī vā kalyāṇa-buddher alpam api lābhaṃ
GS39kamasufu:2234: 6.5.34 āyaty-arthinī tu tam āśritya cān:arthaṃ praticikīrṣantī naiva pratigṛhṇīyāt.
GS39kamasufu:2235_0: 6.5.35 tyakṣyāmy enam anyataḥ pratisandhāsyāmi gamiṣyati dārair yokṣyate nāśayiṣyaty
GS39kamasufu:2235_1: an:arthān aṅkuśa-bhūta uttarādhyakṣo 'syāgamiṣyati svāmī pitā vā sthāna-bhraṃśo vāsya
GS39kamasufu:2236: tasmāl lābham icchet..6.5.36 pratijñātam īśvareṇa pratigrahaṃ lapsyate adhikaraṇaṃ sthānaṃ vā prāpsyati vṛtti-kālo 'sya vā āsannaḥ vāhanam
GS39kamasufu:2237: asyāgamiṣyati sthala-pattraṃ vā sasyam asya pakṣyate kṛtam asmin na naśyati nityam a:visaṃvādako vety āyatyām icchet. parigraha-kalpaṃ
GS39kamasufu:2240: 6.5.37v kṛcchrādhigata-vittāṃś ca rāja-vallabha-niṣṭhurān. āyatyāṃ ca tadātve ca dūrād eva vivarjayet..
GS39kamasufu:2241: 6.5.38v a:artho varjane yeṣāṃ gamane 'bhyudayas tathā. prayatnenāpi tān gṛhya sāpadeśam
GS39kamasufu:2242: 6.5.39v prasannā ye prayacchanti sv:alpe 'py a:gaṇitaṃ vasu. sthūla-lakṣān

GS39kamasufu:2248: 6.6.1 arthān ācaryamāṇān an:arthā apyanūdbhavanty anubandhāḥ saṃśayāś
GS39kamasufu:2249: 6.6.2 te buddhi-daurbalyād ati:rāgād aty:abhimānād ati:dambhād aty:ārjavād
GS39kamasufu:2250: ati:viśvāsād ati:krodhāt pramādāt sāhasād daiva-yogāc ca syuḥ.
GS39kamasufu:2251: 6.6.3 teṣāṃ phalaṃ kṛtasya vyayasya niṣ:phalatvam an:āyatir āgamiṣyato
GS39kamasufu:2252: 'rthasya nivartanam āptasya niṣkramaṇaṃ pāruṣyasya prāptir gamyatā
GS39kamasufu:2253: śarīrasya praghātaḥ keśānāṃ chedanaṃ pātanam aṅga-vaikalyāpattiḥ.
GS39kamasufu:2254: 6.6.4 tasmāt tān ādita eva parijihīrṣed artha-bhūyiṣṭhāṃś copekṣeta.
GS39kamasufu:2258: 6.6.8 saṃdigdhāyāṃ tu phala-prāptau syād vā na veti śuddha-saṃśayaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:2259: 6.6.9 idaṃ vā syād idaṃ veti saṃkīrṇaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:2261: 6.6.11 samantād utpattiḥ samantato:yoga iti tān udāhariṣyāmaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:2263: 6.6.13 yasyottamasyābhigamane praty:akṣato 'rtha-lābho grahaṇīyatvam āyatir āgamaḥ prārthanīyatvaṃ cānyeṣāṃ syāt so 'rtho 'rthānubandhaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:2264: 6.6.14 lābha-mātre kasya cid anyasya gamanaṃ so 'rtho nir:anubandhaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:2265: 6.6.15 anyārtha-parigrahe saktād āyati-cchedanam arthasya niṣkramaṇaṃ loka-vidviṣṭasya vā nīcasya gamanam āyati-ghnam artho 'n:arthānubandhaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:2266_0: 6.6.16 svena vyayena śūrasya mahāmātrasya prabhavato vā lubdhasya gamanaṃ niṣ:phalam
GS39kamasufu:2266_1: api vyasana-pratīkārārthaṃ mahataś cārtha-ghnasya nimittasya praśamanam āyati-jananaṃ
GS39kamasufu:2267: 6.6.17 kadaryasya subhaga-māninaḥ kṛta-ghnasya vāti:sandhāna-śīlasya svair api vyayais tathārādhanam ante niṣ:phalaṃ so 'n:artho nir:anubandhaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:2268: 6.6.18 tasyaiva rāja-vallabhasya kraurya-prabhāvādhikasya tathaivārādhanam ante niṣ:phalaṃ niṣkāsanaṃ ca doṣa-karaṃ so 'n:artho 'n:arthānubandhaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:2273: 6.6.22 niṣpīḍitārtham a:phalam utsṛjantyā artham a:labhamānāyā dharmaḥ syān na veti dharma-saṃśayaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:2274: 6.6.23 abhipretam upalabhya paricārakam anyaṃ vā kṣudraṃ gatvā kāaḥ syān
GS39kamasufu:2280: 6.6.26 rāgasyāpi vivakṣāyām abhipretaman:upalabhya virāgaḥ syān na veti
GS39kamasufu:2284: 6.6.28 āgantor a:vidita-śīlasya vallabha-saṃśrayasya prabhaviṣṇor vā samupasthitasyārādhanam artho 'n:artha iti saṃśayaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:2285: 6.6.29 śrotriyasya brahmacāriṇo dīkṣitasya vratino liṅgino vā māṃ dṛṣṭvā jāta-rāgasya mumūrṣor mitra-vākyād ānṛśaṃsyāc ca gamanaṃ dharmo ':dharma
GS39kamasufu:2286: iti saṃśayaḥ..6.6.30 lokād evā:kṛta-pratyayād a:guṇo guṇavān vety an:avekṣya gamanaṃ kāmo dveṣa iti saṃśayaḥ.
GS39kamasufu:2289: 6.6.32 yatra parasyābhigamane 'rthaḥ saktāc ca saṃgharṣataḥ sa ubhayato 'rthaḥ.
